name: defrost_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on the defrost mode of a refrigerator.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the defrost mode.

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight value associated with the defrost mode.

parameters.name: weightUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the weight value associated with the defrost mode.
